attacks: 2 × claw (1d4), 1 × weapon (1d6 or by weapon), 1 × song (charm)
title: Harpy
description: Hideous hags with the wings and lower bodies of giant eagles. Use their song to lure victims to their doom.
extras: Charm: Anyone who hears the song of a group of harpies must save versus spells or be charmed: move towards the harpies (resisting those who try to prevent it); defend the harpies; obey the harpies’ commands (if understood); unable to cast spells or use magic items; unable to harm the harpies. A character who saves is unaffected for the rest of the encounter. Killing the harpies breaks the charm.	Magic resistance: +2 to all saving throws.
